statements: DELETE FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE usage_date = '2022-01-01' AND measurement_value > 50

DELETE FROM sensors_usage_history WHERE usage_date = '2022-01-15' AND measurement_value > 50

DELETE FROM sensor WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM sensor WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensor_usage WHERE usage_date < '2022-01-01');
